description: Evaluation questions for a multi-package npm monorepo with frontend, backend, libraries, a Rust wasm module, and a Python tool. Includes aggregators and cross-language edges.

questions.name: root_project_name
questions.question: What is the root npm project name (from package.json)?

questions.name: workspace_globs_count
questions.question: How many workspaces patterns are defined in the root package.json?

questions.name: workspace_globs_list
questions.question: List the workspaces patterns defined in the root package.json.

questions.name: backend_packages
questions.question: What are the backend workspace package names? (Provide a list)

questions.name: frontend_packages
questions.question: What are the frontend workspace package names? (Provide a list)

questions.name: libs_packages
questions.question: List the library package names under libs/. (Provide a list)

questions.name: wasm_module_name
questions.question: What is the name of the Rust-based wasm module under modules/?

questions.name: python_tool_name
questions.question: What is the name of the Python tool under tools/?

questions.name: test_files_count
questions.question: How many test files are present across the repo?

questions.name: proxy_server_main_entry
questions.question: What is the main entry file for proxy-server (from its package.json)?

questions.name: api_server_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build api-server? (Exclude test files; provide a list)

questions.name: web_app_dependencies
questions.question: Which components does web-app depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: api_server_external_packages
questions.question: What external packages (npm/dev) does api-server use? (Provide a list)

questions.name: web_app_artifact_path
questions.question: What is the artifact path (relative_path) produced by web-app?

questions.name: logging_lib_dependents_count
questions.question: How many non-aggregator components directly depend on logging-lib?

questions.name: executables_count
questions.question: How many executable components are defined (type=executable)?

questions.name: aggregators_count
questions.question: How many aggregator components are defined (interpreted with multiple dependencies)?

questions.name: max_dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth across components?

questions.name: programming_languages
questions.question: List the programming languages used across components. (Provide a list)

questions.name: no_build_same_src_artifact
questions.question: Which component has the same path for source and artifact (no build step)?

questions.name: affected_by_shared_lib_failure
questions.question: If shared-lib fails to build, which executable components would be unable to build? (Provide a list)

questions.name: affected_by_logging_lib_failure
questions.question: If logging-lib fails, which non-aggregator components are affected (cannot build)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: longest_chain_from_api_server
questions.question: Provide a longest dependency chain starting from api-server. (Provide a list of component names in order)

questions.name: cross_language_components_count
questions.question: How many non-aggregator components have at least one cross-language dependency?

questions.name: reachable_from_build_all
questions.question: How many components are directly depended on by build-all (excluding itself)?

questions.name: leaf_components
questions.question: Which components have no dependencies? (Provide a list)

questions.name: exactly_two_dependents
questions.question: Which non-aggregator components are depended on by exactly two other components? (Provide a list)

questions.name: ts_dist_artifacts_count
questions.question: How many TypeScript components produce artifacts under a dist/ directory?

questions.name: executables_artifact_paths
questions.question: List the artifact paths for all executable components. (Provide a list)

questions.name: shortest_path_api_to_logging
questions.question: What is the length (in edges) of the shortest dependency path from api-server to logging-lib?
